---

Anima Gogoi Deka focuses on Contract Management, Analysis and Advisory work.

Before joining the firm, Anima was associated with Pramata Knowledge Solutions Pvt. Ltd. as Director of Customer Success. She was one of the core members of the India Leadership Team leading various groups across verticals to guide them to success. During her decade-long stint, she has helped companies across verticals varying from Manufacturing, Telecom and Software by enabling solutions that meet their business needs. Her core competency lies in working with the internal teams in understanding the bottlenecks with unstructured contractual data, and providing solutions that increase service efficiency with a positive impact on cost and revenue.

Anima holds B.A LLB (Hons) degree from Delhi University, New Delhi.
